title: Vampire Princess Miyu. Eps 3-4
creator_credit: Toshihiro Hirano, Toru Miura, Kasushi Nomura and Manga Entertainment
brief_description: Continues the story of the childlike vampire, Miyu, guardian of the portal between the human world and that of the Shinma (demon gods). In Fragile Armour’, Miyu pleads with the medium Himiko to help release her mysterious protector-servant Larva from the demon gods who have trapped him between the worlds. Himiko agrees to assist, but only in exchange for information about the elusive vampire’s past.Frozen Time’ sees Himiko return to her childhood home in Kamakura in search of a mysterious house she believed was once there. As she delves deeper into her memories, she discovers the startling link between her fate and that of Miyu. A haunting saga of “beauty, blood and sorrow” from Toshihiro Hirano.
